title: Forbidden Choices: Choose Your Fantasy
description: In Lilith's world, elves and magic are nothing but stories. But as she will soon find, there is more beyond her village and the Old Woods. How fantastical will this new reality be? Can love between a human and an elf exist? In this Choose Your Fantasy story, you must help Lilith choose what path she will take.Due to the gamification of this book, consider the page numbers to be less than the advertised amount, due to blank spaces.This story is not suitable for children. For mature audiences only.
author: Samantha Jenson
